import React from 'react'; import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useQuery } from 'react-query'; import { Calendar, Users, MapPin, Trophy, ArrowLeft, Clock, Target, Award } from 'lucide-react'; import { tournamentService, teamService, matchService } from '../services'; import LoadingSpinner from '../components/LoadingSpinner'; import { formatDate, formatDateTime, getStatusColor } from '../utils/helpers'; const TournamentDetailPage = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const { data: tournament, isLoading: tournamentLoading } = useQuery( ['tournament', id], () => tournamentService.getTournamentById(id), { staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000 } ); const { data: teams, isLoading: teamsLoading } = useQuery( ['tournament-teams', id], () => teamService.getTeamsByTournament(id), { staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, enabled: !!id } ); const { data: matches, isLoading: matchesLoading } = useQuery( ['tournament-matches', id], () => matchService.getMatchesByTournament(id), { staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, enabled: !!id } ); if (tournamentLoading) { return ; } if (!tournament?.data) { return (

Tournament not found

← Back to tournaments
); } const tournamentData = tournament.data; return (
{/* Header */}
Back to Tournaments

{tournamentData.name}

{tournamentData.status}

{tournamentData.description}

{tournamentData.status === 'UPCOMING' && (
Register Team
)}
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Tournament Info */}

Tournament Information

Start Date

{formatDate(tournamentData.startDate)}

End Date

{formatDate(tournamentData.endDate)}

Team Capacity

{teams?.data?.length || 0} / {tournamentData.maxTeams} teams

{tournamentData.location && (

Location

{tournamentData.location}

)}

Tournament Type

{tournamentData.type || 'Standard'}

Format

{tournamentData.format || 'Knockout'}

{tournamentData.rules && (

Rules & Regulations

{tournamentData.rules}

)}
{/* Registered Teams */}

Registered Teams

{teams?.data?.length || 0} teams registered
{teamsLoading ? ( ) : teams?.data?.length === 0 ? (

No teams registered yet

) : (
{teams?.data?.map((team, index) => (
{index + 1}

{team.name}

{team.memberCount || 0} members

))}
)}
{/* Recent Matches */} {matches?.data?.matches?.length > 0 && (

Recent Matches

{matchesLoading ? ( ) : (
{matches.data.matches.slice(0, 5).map((match) => (

{match.team1?.name}

{match.team1Score || 0}

vs

{match.team2?.name}

{match.team2Score || 0}

{formatDateTime(match.scheduledTime)}

{match.status}
))}
)}
)}
{/* Sidebar */}
{/* Quick Stats */}

Quick Stats

Registered Teams {teams?.data?.length || 0}
Total Matches {matches?.data?.totalMatches || 0}
Completed Matches {matches?.data?.completedMatches || 0}
Current Round {matches?.data?.currentRound || 1}
{/* Tournament Organizer */}

Organizer

{tournamentData.organizer || 'EduSports'}

Tournament Organizer

{/* Actions */}

Actions

{tournamentData.status === 'UPCOMING' && ( Register Team )} {matches?.data?.matches?.length > 0 && ( View Bracket )} View All Matches
); }; export default TournamentDetailPage;
